name: Blade of Slashing
description: Whenever the unit rolls to hit in Melee, it can re-roll one of the dice that failed to hit.

name: Fire Oil
description: Against  units  with  the  Regeneration  rule this  unit  gains  an  additional  Piercing  (1) on ‘normal’ ranged attacks, and Crushing Strength (1) in melee.

name: Kevinar's Flying Hammer
description: The unit has a ranged attack for which you roll a sing die, regardless of the Attacks value of the unit.  This attack has a range of 12" and always hits on a 4+, regardless of modifiers, and if a hit is scored, it is resolved at Piercing(2).

name: Mace of Crushing
description: Whenever the unit rolls to damage in melee, it  can  re-roll  one  of  the  dice  that  failed to damage.

name: War-bow of Kaba
description: The unit has a ranged attack for which you roll a single die, regardless of the Attacks value of the unit. This attack has a range of  24"  and,  when  rolling  to  hit,  the  unit uses a basic Ra value of 4+, regardless of its actual Ra value. The roll to hit is affected as normal by to-hit modifiers, and if a hit is scored, it is resolved at Piercing (1).

name: Dwarven Ale
description: The unit has the Headstrong special rule.

name: Myrddin's Amulet of the Fireheart
description: Once per game, after using a ranged attack or spell, this unit may immediately use another different ranged attack or spell it possesses, against the same or a different target.

name: Piercing Arrow
description: Whenever the unit rolls to damage with a ‘normal’ ranged attack, it can re-roll one of the dice that failed to damage.

name: Quicksilver Rapier
description: This  unit  has  +1  to  hit  when  attacking individuals in melee.

name: Brew of Courage
description: When  testing Nerve  against  this  unit,  the enemies suffer an additional -1 to their total.

name: Brew of Haste
description: The unit has +1 Speed.

name: Pipes of Terror
description: The unit has the Brutal special rule.

name: Blade of the Beast Slayer
description: This artefact can only be used by Heroes.The Hero has Crushing Strength (2) when attacking  large  infantry,  large  cavalry, monsters  or  heroes  who  do  not  have  the Individual special rule. If the Hero already has Crushing Strength, it is increased by 2 when attacking those same targets.

name: Darklord's Onyx Ring
description: This artefact can only be used by Heroes with  the  Regeneration  rule.  The  unit’s Regeneration value is increased by 1. For example,  a  unit  with  Regeneration  (5+) now has Regeneration (4+).

name: Helm of Confidence
description: You  must  always  re-roll  a  rout  result  for this unit even if they are not in range of a unit with inspiring.

name: Inspiring Talisman
description: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero has the Inspiring special rule.

name: Maccwar's Potion of the Caterpillar
description: The unit has the Pathfinder special rule.

name: Blessing of the Gods
description: The unit has the Elite special rule.

name: Chant of Hate
description: The unit has the Vicious special rule.

name: Kaba's Holy Hand Grenades
description: The unit has a ranged attack for which you roll a single die, regardless of the Attacks value of the unit. This attack has a range of 12" and always hits  on  4+,  regardless  of  modifiers.  The attack also has the Blast (D6) and Piercing (2) special rule.

name: Scarletmaw's Fenulian Amulet
description: Units  with  the  Lightning  Bolt  spell  only. This  item  increases  the  unit’s  Lightning Bolt (n) value by 2. For example, Lightning Bolt (3) becomes Lightning Bolt (5).

name: Boots of Levitation
description: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero can Advance and then shoot as if it had Halted that turn. It can also move At the Double and shoot as if it had Advanced that turn.

name: Brew of Strength
description: The unit has Crushing Strength (1), or if trhe unit already has Crushing Strength, it is increased by 1.

name: Crepognon's Scrying Gem of Zellak
description: When starting to deploy their units, your opponent must deploy D3+1 units instead of a single one.

name: Diadem of Dragon-kind
description: The unit has the Breath Attack (10) special rule.

name: Healing Charm
description: This artefact can only be used by Heroes. The Hero has the Heal (3) spell.

name: Heart-seeking Chant
description: The unit’s ranged attacks and spells have the Piercing (1) special rule, or if the unit already has Piercing, it is increased by 1.

name: Mreb's Grimoire of Unspeakable Darkness
description: Units with the Surge special rule only. This item increases the unit’s Surge (n) value by 4. For example, Surge (8) becomes Surge (12).

name: The Boomstick
description: Units with the Surge special rule only. This item increases the unit’s Surge (n) value by 4. For example, Surge (8) becomes Surge (12).

name: Boots of the Seven Leagues
description: This artefact can only be used by a Hero with the Individual special rule. The Hero has the Vanguard special rule.

name: Jar of the Four Winds
description: The unit’s ‘normal’ ranged attacks gain 12" to their range.

name: Orcsbain's Amulet of Thorns
description: The unit has the Phalanx special rule.

name: The Fog
description: The unit has the Stealthy special rule.

name: Wine of Elvenkind
description: The unit has the Nimble special rule.

name: Wings of the Honeymaze
description: This artefact can only be used by a Hero with the  Individual  rule.  The  Hero  has  the  Fly special rule and increases their speed to 10.

name: Brew of Sharpness
description: The unit has +1 to hit in melee.

name: Crystal Pendant of Retribution
description: When  the  unit  is  Routed,  all  units  in  base contact  with  it  suffer  2D6  hits  at  Piercing (3). These hits are resolved by the player that Routed the unit with the Crystal, which now has to (grudgingly, we’re sure) resolve the hits against  their  own  unit(s).  After  the  damage has been resolved, no Nerve test is taken by the damaged units – they proceed to Regroup, but cannot move directly forward D6" for their Regroup action, deterred by the huge explosion.

name: Blood of the Old King
description: During one round of combat, grants the unit has Elite and Vicious special rules.
